sentences.en: Amphetamines is one kind of synthetic compounds whose precursor structure is amphetamine.
sentences.cn: 苯丙胺类物质是一大类人工合成的以苯丙胺为母体的化合物.

sentences.en: And so, you make not only water vapor, NOX but you make some nitrous oxides, NOX, or nox as it is known, and this is the precursor to smog.
sentences.cn: 这样不仅仅得到的水蒸气，但是你会得到一些氮氧化物，或者如大家所知到的nox，这是烟雾的前驱体。

sentences.en: Error is often the precursor of what is correct, but conceit is the prelude to a fall.
sentences.cn: 错误往往是正确的先导, 骄傲是跌跤的前奏.

sentences.en: Error is often the precursor of what is correct.
sentences.cn: 错误常常是正确的先导.

sentences.en: Glycerate 3 - phosphate is a precursor of the amino acid serine.
sentences.cn: 甘油 3- 磷酸是丝氨酸的前体.

sentences.en: He said that the deal should not be seen as a precursor to a merger.
sentences.cn: 他说这次交易不应该被看作是合并的前兆。

sentences.en: Hobbes is a precursor of modern positivism and analytical jurisprudence.
sentences.cn: 霍布斯是现代实证主义法学和分析法学的先驱.

sentences.en: In plant cells the principal precursor of alanine , as well as leucine and valine, is pyruvate.
sentences.cn: 植树细胞中丙氨酸和亮氨酸 、 缬氨酸的主要前体是丙酮酸.

sentences.en: In the past this had been the precursor to strong decisions.
sentences.cn: 要是在过去,这就是要采取强力行动的预兆.

sentences.en: Most dolomite is obviously the result of replacement of precursor calcite but certainly not all.
sentences.cn: 多数白云石显然是原来方解石交代的结果,但肯定不是全部.

sentences.en: N - acetylcysteine a precursor of glutathione in cells, is a thiol antioxidant.
sentences.cn: 乙酰半胱氨酸是细胞内还原性谷胱甘肽的前体, 是一种含有巯基的抗氧化剂.

sentences.en: Real tennis, an ancient precursor of the modern game, originated in the eleventh century.
sentences.cn: 室内网球，现代网球运动的古老前身，起源于11世纪。

sentences.en: The immediate transcript of a t RNA gene is known as precursor tRNA.
sentences.cn: tRNA基因的直接转录物叫做tRNA前体.

sentences.en: The precursor of the pigment from Peristrophe baphica is an unstable compound.
sentences.cn: 山蓝色素前体是很不稳定的化合物.

sentences.en: They alter the way it cleaves amyloid precursor protein.
sentences.cn: 它们改变了这个酶切割淀粉样蛋白前体的方式.

sentences.en: Thiophene, a highly common substance, serves as a versatile precursor to a variety of amino acids.
sentences.cn: 噻吩是一种很普通的物质, 它可以作为合成各种氨基酸的母体.

sentences.en: Viewed as a precursor to a wider open data movement, it could be as important as any we have seen in the web era.
sentences.cn: 它被视为更宽泛的数据开放运动的先导，它将像我们在互联网时代看到的所有重要的事物一样重要。

sentences.en: What became of the head of the Precursor is difficult to determine.
sentences.cn: 这位先驱者的人头的来源很难确定.

trans.tran_cn: 前辈，前驱，先锋，前任，预兆，先兆，初期形式，[核]前驱波，初级粒子，预报器
trans.tran_en: something that happened or existed before something else and influenced its development
